alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 15 at 6:32PM CDT until October 15 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL SALINE AND WESTERN PULASKI COUNTIES... At 631 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Salem in Saline County, or 10 miles northwest of Benton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs Village... Bland... Crows... Owensville... Paron... Grape... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
